description: Coordination sequence for body-centered tetragonal lattice.
comments: Also sequence found by reading the segment (1, 10) together with the line from 10, in the direction 10, 34,..., in the square spiral whose vertices are the generalized hexagonal numbers A000217. - _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 02 2012
references: M. O'Keeffe, Coordination sequences for lattices, Zeit. f. Krist., 210 (1995), 905-908.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
crossrefs: Apart from leading term, same as A108100.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
